Articles.Content:
So when Nova Silsko wis still a ksp dev he had a plot for ksp involving a long lost planet, monoliths, and Duna. The page for this is here [http://pastebin.com/3vvjushy](http://pastebin.com/3vvjushy)

sadly Nova left the dev team before this was added.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-02-20T18:13:40Z" title="02/20/2015 06:13  PM" data-short="9 yr">February 20, 2015</time> by MrWalrus123**

Cool however it sounds a bit to complicated for most players. 

I had an idea of some missions where the endgame was to return an multi ton alien module from Eve to unlock an starship jump or warp drive.
I am yet to try excavate a monument bring bring it back to the KSC.

Now we have contracts I would welcome contracts to explore easter eggs/anomalies that could be given after the player has completed every 'explore X' contract.

Very easy to implement, increases gameplay no end.

Of course a new planet not on the map would be awesome but it seems everything it getting fixed for 1.0 so it does not look likely any more.

> 
> I would welcome contracts to explore easter eggs/anomalies

Like everything, there's a mod for that;

[http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/109471-0-90-Contract-Pack-Anomaly-Surveyor-v1-0-1-2015-02-12](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/109471-0-90-Contract-Pack-Anomaly-Surveyor-v1-0-1-2015-02-12)

I've been playing through it after completing/visiting all the other planets, it's good fun!

> 
> ...managed to launch numerous monoliths across the system, in hopes of seeding intelligent life. Their plan failed. They made Kerbals.

I lol'd....
